roleset.name: to tear or scratch with claws

example.name: make it to the top
example.text: Cheesepuff an friends firt clawed their way onto the music charts in 1993 with the release of their "meowy Chrsitmas" CD, featuring 20 classic Christmas hits.
example.arg: with the release of their "meowy Chrsitmas"...

roleset.note: frame by Perry. Maps to VN class swat-18.2.

example.name: VerbNet example
example.text: The cat clawed the counch to pieces with her sharp nails.

example.name: With arg2
example.text: Some sort of demon, all teeth and glowing eyes, erupted from it and clawed the skin off the back of his hand.
example.arg: Some sort of demon, all teeth and glowing eyes,
off the back of his hand.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'claw' based on ebn instances.
